props.name: name
props.description: A unique identifier for the tooltip

props.name: position
props.description: Positions the tooltip to the target { 1: 'top', 2: 'right', 3: 'bottom', 4: 'left' }

slots.name: (default)
slots.description: The default slot holds the tooltip text and can contain HTML

slots.name: title
slots.description: The title slot holds the tooltip's title text and can contain HTML
